platform.description: The platform for which the performance data is being reported.

breakdown.description: The breakdown dimension for the performance data.

impressions.description: The total number of impressions served.

clicks.description: The total number of clicks recorded.

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions across all events.

conversions.description: The total number of conversions achieved.

viewConversions.description: The total number of conversions achieved from views.

spend.description: The total amount spent on advertising.

conversionRate.description: The percentage of clicks that resulted in a conversion.

viewConversionRate.description: The percentage of views that resulted in a conversion.

totalCpa.description: The total cost-per-acquisition across all events.

totalSumValue.description: The total sum value generated across all events.

sumValue.description: The sum value generated from all events.

viewSumValue.description: The sum value generated from all view events.

totalAverageValue.description: The total average value across all events.

averageValue.description: The average value generated per event.

viewAverageValue.description: The average value generated per event for views.

totalRoas.description: The total return on ad spend across all events.

roas.description: The return on ad spend calculated.

videoReachedFirstQ.description: The number of video plays that reached the first quartile.

videoReachedSecondQ.description: The number of video plays that reached the second quartile.

videoReachedThirdQ.description: The number of video plays that reached the third quartile.

videoReachedCompletion.description: The number of video plays that reached completion.

videoViewDuration.description: The total view duration of video content.

videoAvgViewDuration.description: The average view duration of video content.

videoPlays.description: The total number of video plays recorded.

clicksOnVideo.description: The number of clicks specifically on video content.

videoActiveCompletions.description: The number of active completions on video content.

videoActiveCompletionsPercentage.description: The percentage of active completions on video content.

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketer associated with the performance data.
